## `ExcludeFileAddress`

Specifies whether to exclude\index{text exclusion} file paths\index{file paths!excluding} and URLs from the document analysis.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
ExcludeFileAddress(boolean exclude)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `boolean` exclude | `true` to exclude filepaths and URLs, `false` to include them. |
:::
